txt.en: You have been tasked with clearing trolls from a hall within Gundabad.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'My scouts have returned from Hadnul-zahar. There within the old dwarf halls, trolls have taken hold and protect it as their own. This can not stand! We must return to Hadnul-zahar and show these trolls that Gundabad belongs to the dwarves!'
'Within the old halls of Hadnul-zahar, in Gundabad, trolls now hold a hall that is essential to our cause….\n\n'Your mission is to uproot the trolls within the hall in Gundabad.'
The monster commander in this mission will attempt a brutal wounding attack.
Your mission is to uproot the trolls within the ancient hall in Gundabad.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel.

'Well done! With the dreadful Ghámgur Tremblestone defeated, and the trolls driven back, the old halls of Hadnul-zahar are once again safe. If we are to reclaim Gundabad, we must find and oust all that oppose us!'
